item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND. "

FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 24, at Holiday Inn Grand Ballroom, 929 Hingham St., Rockland. Exit 14, Rte. 228, off Rte. 3 south.
(781)871-0545.
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by Award-winning DJ from 8:30-12 AM.
NEW**BALLROOM DANCING 7:30-8:30.
Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvres, free door prizes, raffles and MATCH GAME prizes.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES, 35-65 years old.
Cost is $13 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women.
Call (781)446-0234 for info.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
